metadata.synopsis: This dialogue plays during and after a group of druids turn on the tieflings in the grove and attack them. Gan is taken into a secret cave to hide during the druid attack. She's full of bravado - she's had training with a wooden sword, and she's eager to show off. She doesn't quite grasp the seriousness of the situation.

0.speaker: Gan
0.text: Leave one for me next time! A little one.
0.context: NodeContext: Acting tough. The druids are dealt with.

1.speaker: Gan
1.text: There's no druids left for us! No fair!
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands on hips. The druids are dealt with.NodeContext: Childish

2.speaker: Gan
2.text: Don't worry about us. I'll stab anyone who sneaks in.
2.context: NodeContext: Acting tough. She's hiding with the other children while the druids attack.
